name: Adiba
meaning: yozuvchi qiz, ziyoli, ilmli, ijodkor, ilhom izlagan, nazokatli,tarbiyali, odobli, namunali, iffatli qiz

name: Aziza
meaning: qadrli, qimmatli, tabarruk, hurmatli yoki qudratli, izzatli, noyob

name: Akifa
meaning: g‘ayratli, shijoatli, xudojo‘y qiz

name: Alima
meaning: bilimli, aql-zakovatli, dilkash qiz

name: Anora
meaning: qizil holli, norli qiz

name: Asal
meaning: asaldek shirin, totli, ya’ni yoqimtoy, suyukli, sevimli qiz

name: Asila
meaning: aslzoda, nasli toza qiz, sof, pokiza, qalbi g‘uborsiz, benuqson qiz

name: Asliya
meaning: sof, pokiza, toza; aslzoda

name: Asolat
meaning: asllik, aslzoda, zoti pok yoki puxta, mustahkam

name: Afzuna
meaning: ziyoda, ortiq, yuksak tutuvchi. Yuqoriga intilgan, qadrli, qimmatli. E’tiborga loyiq, yuksak martabali

name: Afruza
meaning: oydek ravshan, quyosh nuridek porloq, shul’ador, yondiruvchi, otashin. Ro‘za oyida tug‘ilgan chiroyli, oydek qiz

name: Barno
meaning: yosh, navqiron, chiroyli, hushbichim, hushqad

name: Barchinoy, Oybarchin
meaning: oy yuzli, oy chehrali qiz, iboli, hayoli, oqko‘ngil, qalbi pok, toza

name: Binafsha
meaning: binafsha guldek ko‘rkam, nafis, suluv qiz

name: Begoyim
meaning: beklar, aslzodalar avlodiga mansub, oliy nasab, viqorli, martabasi baland qiz

name: Davriya
meaning: davr farzandi, zamon qizi

name: Dilafruz
meaning: dilni quvontiruvchi, shodlantiruvchi, dil guli, dilni ochuvchi, yayratuvchi, ko‘ngilga huzur, shodlik baxsh etuvchi, kayfiyatni ko‘taruvchi

name: Dilbar
meaning: yoqimli, yoqimtoy, ko‘ngilni oluvchi, maftun qiluvchi, go‘zal, suyukli, zebo

name: Dildora
meaning: dildan sevilgan, chin muhabbat sohibasi, dilni rom qiluvchi yoki rahmdil, jasur, dovyurak

name: Dilnoza
meaning: ishvali, nozli qalb egasi, nozik, nafis dil sohibi

name: Dilorom
meaning: ko‘ngilga taskin, orom beruvchi, huzur-halovat, osoyishtalik baxsh etuvchi; suyukli, sevimli qiz

name: Dilrabo
meaning: dilni tortuvchi, qalbni maftun etuvchi, jozibali, latofatli, nazokatli, ko‘ngilni jalb qiluvchi, suyukli, yoqimtoy, oqko‘ngil, go‘zal qiz

name: Dilso‘z
meaning: jonkuyar, mehribon, mushfiq, dildagi gaplarning egasi, chin so‘z

name: Dilfuza
meaning: dilfiruza ismning o‘zgartirilgan shakli. Dilni yorituvchi, ko‘ngilga, qalbga shodlik, quvonch olib keluvchi, shavq bag‘ishlovchi, tengsiz, ko‘rkam

name: Diyora
meaning: o‘lka, zamin, ona yurtning vafodor, fidokor, elim, yurtim deb yashovchi farzand

name: Durdona
meaning: inju donasi, a’lo marvarid; eng aziz, qadrli, chiroyli, nafis, suluv qiz

name: E’zoza
meaning: hurmatga, izzat-ikromga, e’zozlanishga sazovor qiz

name: Fazilat
meaning: yaxshi hislatlar egasi, go‘zal xulqi bilan boshqalardan afzal, ustun turuvchi

name: Farangiz
meaning: nur sochuvchi, ziyokor yoki go‘zal, suyukli, shu’la sochuvchi go‘zal qiz

name: Farida
meaning: bebaho, nodir, noyob, marvarid yoki pardali bo‘lib tug‘ilgan qiz

name: Feruza
meaning: baxtli, iqboli baland, tolei porloq, saodatli qiz yoki firuza (ko‘k tusli tovlanuvchi qimmatbaho tosh)dek aziz, qimmatli, qadrli, bebaho, chiroyli, zebo, nafis; nurli nur sochuvchi

name: Fotima
meaning: fatiat - ko‘krakdan ajratilgan. Bu nom Muhammmad (s.a.v.)ning kenja qizlarining ismi bo‘lgan. Egizak qizlar tug‘ilganda kattasini Fotima deb nomlash millatimizda urfga aylangan

name: Gavxar
meaning: gur, marvariddek bebaho qiz yoki asl, aslzoda

name: Gulasal
meaning: guldek go‘zal, chiroyli, nafis, latofatli va boldek shirin, yoqimtoy suyukli, aziz qiz

name: Gulbaxor
meaning: bahor guli, ko‘klam chechagidek dilbar, suluv, sohibjamol, go‘zal qiz, bahorda uyg‘onish davrida tug‘ilgan qiz. Hayoti guldek chiroyli bo‘lsin ma’nosida

name: Guljamol
meaning: guldek go‘zal husn sohibi, husni jamoli guldek zebo qiz

name: Guljaxon
meaning: baxtli kunlar, ya’ni baxtli, saodatli kunda tug‘ilgan. Hayotda baxtiyor, iqboli, porloq, tolei baland bo‘lsin

name: Gulzira
meaning: zira gulidek yoqimtoy qiz

name: Gulzoda
meaning: go‘zallar nasliga mansub, hurliqolar avlodidan bo‘lgan qiz, guldek nafis, latofatli, zebo va suluv

name: Gullola
meaning: loladek, lolaguldek chiroyli qiz, lolalar ochilganda tug‘ilgan qiz

name: Gulnoza
meaning: gul kabi nafis, nozik va nozli, jilvali gul, yohud go‘zal va nozli qiz

name: Gulnora
meaning: anor gulidek zebo, gul chehrali qiz yoki anor gullaganda tug‘ilgan qiz

name: Guloy
meaning: guldek va oydek zebo qiz yoki guldek yashnagan va oydek nurli, ko‘rkam qiz

name: Gulra’no
meaning: qizil guldek ko‘rkam, go‘zal, nafis, sohibjamol, o‘zidan chiroy taratuvchi qiz

name: Gulsora
meaning: saralangan, tanlangan gul, gullarning sarasi, a’losi, eng yaxshi qiz

name: Gulchexra
meaning: gul yuzli, hushro‘y, sohibjmol, chiroyli, maftunkor, istarali, go‘zal chehrali suluv qiz

name: Go‘zal
meaning: chiroyli, zebo, suluv, latofatli, jozibali, nazokatli

name: Halima
meaning: muloyim, mehribon, rahmdil, mehrli, shafqatli, xushmuomala, beozor, suyukli qiz. Payg‘amabarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.)ga oq sut bergan ayolning ismi

name: Hanifa
meaning: rostgo‘y, pokiza, sodiq yoki mehribon, g‘amxo‘r

name: Hilola
meaning: yangi oydek ko‘rkam qiz yoki yangi oy chiqqanida tug‘ilgan go‘zal husnli qiz

name: Hosiyat
meaning: yaxshi sifatlar, fazilatlar, go‘zal hislatlar egasi yoki omadli, ishi yurishgan yoki xosiyatli kunda tug‘ilgan qiz

name: Hurshida
meaning: quyoshdek husnu jamol sohibasi bo‘lgan go‘zal, suluv latofatli, zebo; oftobmonand qiz, quyosh farzandi

name: Husnida
meaning: husniddin ismiga qiyosan yasalgan ism. Go‘zal va chiroyli xusn egasi bo‘lsin degan niyatda

name: Husniya
meaning: go‘zal chehrali, chiroyli, latofatli, maftunkor yuzli, zebo qiz

name: Husnora
meaning: bezangan, o‘ziga qaragan, zebo qiz; husnda tengsiz, o‘ziga munosib bo‘lgan, mos tushgan go‘zal husn, chiroy va latofat sohibasi

name: Iroda
meaning: istab orzu qilib erishilgan qiz yoki Allohning irodasi, muruvvati bo‘lgan qiz, yohud irodali, chidamli qiz

name: Iffar
meaning: pokiza, ma’suma, bokira qiz

name: Ifora
meaning: hushbo‘y, yoqimli iforli, nafis hid taratuvchi

name: Jamila
meaning: go‘zal, sohibjamol, maftunkor, nafis, suluv qiz

name: Jasmina
meaning: jannatning guli, jannatda o‘suvchi gulning nomi, hushbo‘y, ifori kuchli chiroyli gul

name: Jumagul
meaning: juma kuni tug‘ilgan guldek suluv, zebo, go‘zal qiz. Arabcha,  fors-tojikcha.

name: Kamola
meaning: kamolga erishgan yetuk, zebo, ko‘rkam, mukmal inson

name: Karima
meaning: sahovatli, sahiy, qo‘li ochiq, mehribon, rahmli, qalbi pok qiz

name: Komila
meaning: barkamol, yetuk, bekamu-ko‘st, namunali, ibratli qiz

name: Kumush
meaning: kumushdek yorqin, qadrli, qiz yoki oq yuzli oqbadan go‘zal qiz

name: Laylo
meaning: tunda tug‘ilgan qiz yoki nilufar (safsan)dek go‘zal qiz. Qadimiy yahudiy tilida: Liliya – Safsangul

name: Latofat
meaning: nazokatli, mehribon, latofatli, pokiza, shavqatli, zebo qiz

name: Lola
meaning: loladek yashnagan, nafosatli, chiroyli. ko‘rkam, go‘zal qiz yoki lolalar ochilgan payitda tug‘ilgan qiz

name: Lobar
meaning: go‘zal, ko‘rkam, kelishgan, yoqimtoy, nafis, hushfe’l, dilkash qiz

name: Lutfiya
meaning: mehribon, dilkash, rahmdil, ko‘ngli pok qiz

name: Mavluda
meaning: hosiyatli, yaxshi, muqaddas kunda tug‘ilgan qiz, umrida yaxshi kunlar ko‘p bo‘lsin, hayoti chiroyli o‘tsin

name: Madina
meaning: Saudiya Arabistonidagi muqaddas shahar, ziyoratgox bo‘lgan Madinai Munavvara ismidan olingan ism

name: Malika
meaning: podshohning avlodiga mansub ulug‘ martabali ayol. Shohbonu, go‘zallar go‘zali, mahvashlar mahvashi, zakovatli sohiba. Malikalardek obro‘-e’tiborli bo‘lsin ma’nosida ham qo‘yiladi. Ushbu ism sohibalaridan biri Amir Temurning xotini, katta malika

name: Maloxat
meaning: go‘zal, suluv, nafosatli, dilkash, malohatli, ko‘rkam qiz

name: Marjona
meaning: dur, inju, marvaridlar tizimi, qizil rangli yirik munchoq, marjondek qimmatbaho va suluv qiz

name: Mastura
meaning: berkitilgan, yopiq yuzli, halol, pok, toza, pardali, iffatli, hayoli, iboli qiz

name: Mafzuna
meaning: latofatli, chiroyli, go‘zallar ichida yagona, suluv va nafosatli qiz

name: Mafruza
meaning: tanlab, saylab olingan

name: Maxsuma
meaning: sof, pokiza, gunohsiz

name: Mashxura
meaning: taniqli, obro‘-e’tiborli, odamlar nazarida bo‘lgan, hurmatli, e’zozli qiz

name: Ma’mura
meaning: baxtli, nasibali, farovon yashovchi; boshqaruvchi, yetakchi, yo‘l ko‘rsatuvchi, boshliq

name: Maqsuda
meaning: orzu qilingan, orziqib kutilgan qiz

name: Maxbuba
meaning: suyukli, qadrli, aziz do‘st, dilbar, dilkash, ko‘ngli toza, sevilgan, dilbar qiz

name: Maxfuza
meaning: himoyalangan, muhofazaga olingan yoki qo‘rg‘on, qasr, qal’adek mustahkam baquvvat, yengilmas

name: Moxigul
meaning: oydek suluv, chiroyli va gul kabi ko‘rkam qiz, oyning chekkasidagi gul

name: Moxidil
meaning: oydek go‘zal, maftunkor, suluv, qalbi pok, dili toza, go‘zal, fazilatli qiz

name: Moxina
meaning: oyga o‘xshash, oymonand, nafis, nozik yoki yangi oy chiqqan paytda tug‘ilgan yoki yangi oydek suluv qiz

name: Moxinur
meaning: oyning nuri, oydin, oydindek pokiza, suluv, chiroyli, oydek go‘zal qiz

name: Moxira
meaning: mahoratli, ustamon, puxta, pishiq, qo‘li gul, epchil, chaqqon, ozoda va saranjom qiz

name: Muazzam
meaning: hurmatli, e’zozli, qadrli, e’tiborli qiz

name: Muattar
meaning: xushbo‘y, yoqimli hid tarqatuvchi, atir sochuvchi, muattar hidli

name: Mubina
meaning: jozibali, istarasi issiq, lobar, ochiq chehrali, rostgo‘y, latofatli, zebo qiz

name: Muzayyana
meaning: bezangan, ziynatlangan, orasta

name: Muqaddam
meaning: oldinda boruvchi, peshvo yoki oiladagi ilk, birinchi bola

name: Muqaddas
meaning: tabarruk, aziz, qadrli yoki pokiza, sof, benuqson, ozoda, qutlug‘

name: Mumtoz
meaning: tanlangan, saralangan, zo‘r

name: Muniba
meaning: to‘g‘ri yo‘l (din yo‘li)ga kiruvchi; xudojo‘y, oqila inson degan manoni anglatadi

name: Munira
meaning: nurli, ravshan, go‘zal, zebo, baxtli, saodatmand, nur sochuvchi, yuzidan nur taraluvchi, zebo qiz

name: Munisa
meaning: do‘st, o‘rtoq, sirdosh; sodiq do‘st

name: Muslima
meaning: musulmon, xudojo‘y ayol, soliha, Allohga itoat etuvchi mo‘mina qiz

name: Muxlisa
meaning: oqko‘ngil qiz, xudojo‘y, muslima, mo‘mina qiz

name: Muxsina
meaning: mehribon, yaxshiliklar qiluvchi, muruvvatli, hayirli amallarga intiluvchi, rahmdil qiz

name: Mushtariy
meaning: Yupiter sayyorasining nomi yoki biror nima sotib oluvchi, xaridor

name: Muyassar
meaning: orzu qilib yurib erishilgan; Alloh erishtirgan, sovg‘a qilgan, muyassar qilgan qiz. Hayotidagi barcha orzulari, niyatlari muyassar bo‘lib ijobat bo‘lsin ma’nosida ham qo‘yiladi

name: Nargiza
meaning: nargis (bo‘tagul) dek nozik, nafis, zebo, go‘zal qiz, ifori taraluvchan

name: Nasiba
meaning: rizqu-ro‘zli, nasibali qiz. Umri to‘kin-sochinlikda, bekamu-ko‘st o‘tsin, nasibali bo‘lsin ma’nosida

name: Nafisa
meaning: nafis, nozik, go‘zal, nafosatli, latofatli, foyda keltiruvchi, yaxshiliklar qiluvchi

name: Nigora
meaning: go‘zal chehrali, sohibjamol, o‘ziga rom etuvchi, maftunkor, latofatli, jozibali, go‘zal, zebo, tengsiz husn sohibasi, yoqimtoy

name: Nilufar
meaning: nilufar (savsan) o‘simligidek chiroyli, zebo qiz, o‘ziga maftun etuvchi

name: Nodira
meaning: tengi yo‘q, yagona, tengsiz, bebaho, benazir, nodir, betakror, beqiyos go‘zallik sohibasi go‘zal, latofatli, zebo qiz

name: Nozima
meaning: tartibga, intizomga rioya qiladigan, ya’ni tartibli, sarishta

name: Noila
meaning: orzu qilingan, intiqib kutilgan qiz. Alloh bergan sovg‘a, tuhfa

name: Nuriya
meaning: baxtli, shodon qiz, hayoti nurli ravshan; o‘zidan nur sochuvchi, oftobdek quvonchli qiz

name: Ozoda
meaning: erkin, ixtiyori o‘zida; baxtli, baxtiyor yoki toza, pokiza, saranjom, tartibli, begunoh, beg‘ubor. Ba’zi manbalarada saxiy, oq ko‘ngil, qalbi pok deb ham izohlanadi

name: Oygul
meaning: oydek suluv, go‘zallikda yorqin, guldek zebo, nafis, chiroyli, maftunkor, istarali qiz

name: Oynur
meaning: oy yog‘dusidek go‘zal, pokiza; nurafshon qiz

name: Oysha
meaning: yashovchi, barhayot, umri uzoq, hayoti nurli qiz. Bu ism Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning ayollari Oysha (r.a.) ismlari bo‘lgan

name: Oliya
meaning: yuksak, oliy, ulug‘; e’zozli, izzatli, ulug‘vor, martabali, e’tiborli

name: Omina
meaning: omonlikda saqlanuvchi, ya’ni muhofaza qilingan ishonchli ravishda qo‘riqlangan, daxlsiz yoki rostgo‘y, vafodor. Omina - Muhammad (s.a.v.) onasining ismi bo‘lgan

name: Orzu
meaning: ota-onasini orzusiga erishtirgan, maqsadiga yetkazg‘an yoki orziqib kutilgan qiz

name: Osiyo
meaning: tegirmon yoki Osiyo qizi, Osiyo farzandi

name: Rayona, Rayyona
meaning: Rayyon-jannat eshiklaridan biri. Bu eshikdan faqat ro‘za tutganlar kiritiladi

name: Rayxona
meaning: nozbo‘y, iforli, rayhonday yoqimtoy, yoqimli, nafis, jozibali qiz. Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning ayollaridan birining nomi

name: Ramziya
meaning: timsol, o‘rnak, namuna

name: Rasifa, Rasixa
meaning: chidamli, mahkam, irodali qiz yoki pokiza, ozoda qiz

name: Ra’no
meaning: qizil guldek go‘zal, chiroyli, latofatli, ra’no guldek suluv, purlatofat qiz

name: Robiya
meaning: oiladagi to‘rtinchi bola yoki hijriy oy hisobining to‘rtinchi kunida tug‘ilgan bola

name: Roziya
meaning: mamnun yoki maqbul tushuvchi, ma’qul keluvchi; yoqimli, suyukli, e’zozli, qadrli; rozilik, shukronalik, itoatgo‘ylik, mamnunlik bahsh etgan

name: Saboxon
meaning: tong eli, shabadasi; yoqimli, muloyim yoki sahar paytida tug‘ilgan bola

name: Saboxat
meaning: ko‘rkamlik, go‘zallik, malohat, oq yuzli go‘zal, sabo tongi shabadasi, nafislik chiroyi

name: Sadoqat
meaning: vafodor, sodiq, chin samimiy do‘st, ishonish, suyanish mumkin bo‘lgan yaqin inson

name: Saida
meaning: baxtli, omadli, tolei baland, iqboli porloq, saodatmand qiz

name: Sayyora
meaning: tez harakat qiluvchi yulduz; sayyora planetasi yoki tolei baland, iqboli porloq, baxtli-saodatli qiz

name: Salima
meaning: sog‘lom, umri uzoq qiz yoki samimiy, dilkash, ko‘ngli ochiq, vafodor qiz

name: Samina
meaning: qadrli, izzat-obro‘li qiz yoki Samin (gul)dek chiroyli, zarif, latofatli qiz

name: Samira
meaning: suhbatdosh, hamsuhbat, shirinso‘z, dilkash va ko‘ngli ochiq qiz

name: Samiya
meaning: ziyrak, sezgir, dono qiz

name: Sanobar
meaning: hushqomat, chiroy, daraxtning nomi, sanavbardek go‘zal, kelishgan, hushbichim, suluv qomatli qiz

name: Saodat
meaning: baxtli, saodatli, baxtiyor, iqboli porloq, tolei balnd qiz

name: Sarvinoz
meaning: tik qomatli, bo‘y-basti kelishgan, sarv daraxtidek kelishgan va nozik qiz

name: Safiya
meaning: aql, donishmandlik yoki arabcha Sofiya - sof, pokiza, pokdomon, ma’suma, iffatli. Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning o‘n uchinchi ayollarining ismi bo‘lgan

name: Safura
meaning: yulduz, yorug‘ yulduz; yorqin, porloq; shukuhli, hashamatli, mag‘rur yoki sochlari sariq qiz

name: Saxida
meaning: to‘g‘ri, barvasta qadli, go‘zal qomatli

name: Sevara
meaning: suyukli, yoqimtoy, qadrli aziza qiz

name: Sitora
meaning: yulduz, baxtli, omadli, chiroyli, tolei baland qiz, yulduz kabi porloq

name: Sojida
meaning: sajda qiluvchi, taqvodor, Allohga sig‘inuvchi, muslima mo‘mina qiz

name: Solixa
meaning: salohiyatli, pokiza, ozoda yoki diyonatli, taqvodor, xudojo‘y, muslima qiz

name: Soxiba
meaning: uyning egasi, bekasi, malikasi yoki do‘st, hayotdagi sodiq yo‘ldosh, suyukli rafiqa, sevilgan yor

name: Taxmina
meaning: kuchli, qudratli; jasur. «Shohnoma» asari qahramoni Suhrobning onasini ismi

name: Umida
meaning: orzu qilingan, umid bilan kutilgan qiz yoki yashab ketishiga umid qilingan qiz

name: Umriya
meaning: uzoq umr yashab hayoti barakali, chiroyli o‘tsin hamda qalbi toza pokiza qiz ma’nosida qo‘yiladi

name: Vazira
meaning: ulg‘ayib vazira, martabali, obro‘li bo‘lsin ma’nosida niyat qilib qo‘yiladi. Erining soliha yordamchisi bo‘lsin ma’nosida ham

name: Valiya
meaning: taqvodor, iymonu-e’tiqodli, xudojo‘y ayol

name: Vasliya
meaning: visolga, murod-maqsadga, orzu-umid, go‘zal havasga intiluvchi, erishuvchi qiz

name: Visola
meaning: tilab, so‘rab yurib erishilgan, kutib yetishilgan qiz yoki husnijamol, go‘zal, latofatli, suluv, chiroyli qiz

name: Yasmina
meaning: jannatning guli, jannatda o‘suvchi gulning nomi, hushbo‘y, ifori kuchli chiroyli gul

name: Yorqinoy
meaning: hayoti nurli va oydek suluv qiz yoki mehribon dilkash qiz

name: Yulduz
meaning: yulduzdek yorug‘ yuzli, nurli, chiroyli, latofatli va suluv qiz. Tolei yulduzdek yuksak va iqboli porloq, hayoti nurga to‘la bo‘lsin

name: Zaynab
meaning: to‘lachadan kelgan, semiz, durkun; kelishgan, go‘zal. Zaynab nomi Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.) qizlarining ismi bo‘lgan

name: Zaynura
meaning: go‘zal, zebo qiz

name: Zamira
meaning: oliyjanob, vijdonli, pokdomon, iboli, ifffatli, pokiza qiz

name: Zarina
meaning: zarli, oltinli, zarlangan, zarrin, chiroyli, go‘zal, ko‘z qamashtiruvchi husn sohibasi, suluv qiz

name: Zarnigor
meaning: tilloga bezangan, zeblangan, bebaho, qadri baland, zarrin yoki sochlari tillodek jilvali, tovlanib turuvchi, chiroyli, maftunkor qiz

name: Zarifa
meaning: pokiza, ma’suma, iffatli, nozik ta’b, fahm-farosatli, aqlli, oriyatli, hayo-iboli, munis, xushfahm qiz

name: Zaxro
meaning: yorqin, ravshan, oq yuzli. Nurli, porloq, nur taratuvchi yoki intiluvchi, havas qiluvchi, oldinga intiluvchi

name: Zebiniso
meaning: ayollarning eng go‘zali, zebosi, zebu-ziynati, latofati, jozibali, maftun qiluvchi, o‘ziga rom etuvchi chiroyda teng yo‘q qiz

name: Zebo
meaning: chiroyli, go‘zal, suluv, husni jamoli nafis qiz

name: Zulfiya
meaning: sochi o‘ralib tug‘ilgan, jingalak, jilvakor sochli qiz, suluv, latofatli, maftunkor zebo

name: Ziyoda
meaning: qizlari yetarli (ziyoda) bo‘ldi, endigisi o‘g‘il bo‘lsin yoki umri ziyoda, uzun bo‘lsin, baxtli bo‘lsin. Badanda ortiqcha belgisi, ortig‘i bo‘lsa ham bu ism qo‘yiladi

name: Zilola
meaning: tiniq buloq suvidek pokiza, sof, toza, beg‘ubor oqila qiz

name: Zinnura
meaning: nurli, ravshan, chiroyli, dilbar qiz

name: Ziroat
meaning: hosil, hosila. Mo‘l-ko‘lchilik, qut-baraka olib keluvchi qiz

name: Zoxida
meaning: dindor, xudojo‘y, mo‘mina ayol

name: Zulayxo
meaning: kichik, kenja qiz. Ism ma’nosi turli ko‘rinishda keladi. Ba’zilar sirg‘anchiq, silliq, muloyim deb ham talqin qilishgan. Yusuf payg‘ambarning ayollarining ismi bo‘lgan

name: Zulxumor
meaning: xumorli, qo‘msalgan, orziqib, intizor bo‘lib kutilgan qiz yoki dilbar, maftunkor, jozibali, ishvali, o‘ziga rom etuvchi

name: Zumrad
meaning: yashil tusli qimmatbaho tosh, zumraddek qimmatli, bebaho, noyob, zebo, latofatli, suluv qiz yoki ko‘k ko‘zli qiz

name: Shaxzoda
meaning: shoh farzandi, shohlar nasliga mansub qiz. Yuqori martabali, mehribon, ko‘ngli toza obro‘-e’tiborli bo‘lsin

name: Shaxina
meaning: shohlar avlodi vakillaridek mard, jasur, ziyrak, dovyurak, qo‘rqmas qiz

name: Shaxlo
meaning: katta qora ko‘zli qiz, qora ko‘zli go‘zal, chiroyli, suluv, maftunkor qiz

name: Shaxnoza
meaning: shohona, beklarcha yoki nozli karashmali, latofatli. Shohlar, aslzodalar avlodiga mansub nozik va zebo go‘zal qiz

name: Shaxrizoda
meaning: shohlar, aslzodalar nasliga mansub ko‘rkam, chiroyli qomatli qiz; podshohzoda, shohzoda, viqorli

name: Shirin
meaning: totli, chuchuk, lazzatli. Aziz, yoqimli, suyukli

name: Shodiya
meaning: shodon, quvnoq, baxtiyor qiz. Shodlik, xursandchilik kuni tug‘ilgan qiz. Odamlarga shodlik olib keluvchi

name: Shoira
meaning: so‘zga chechan, shirinsuxan, notiqa qiz bo‘lsin. Ulg‘ayib shoira bo‘lib she’rlar ijod qilsin ma’nosida. Forscha Shaere - «shoir ayol» dan kelib chiqqan
